channel.title: Help I cant remember how to do This Error,
channel.description:
The compiler says:
clinet.java:2424: ';' expexted setAnimation(0x326); ^ 1 error, Ihavnt played mopar for a long time so i cant remember how to do this error, please help.

item.title: Help I cant remember how to do This Error,
item.dc:creator: @planplan planplan
item.description:
@planplan wrote:

replace that crap with this

sendMessage("Attack the spandex aqua bra!!"); addItem(1338, 3); setgfx(326); addSkillXP((1200*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((300*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((635*playerLevel[19]), 19); actionTimer = 12; } break;

Read full topic

item.title: Help I cant remember how to do This Error,
item.dc:creator: @claber_guy claber guy
item.description:
@claber_guy wrote:

the code is

sendMessage("Attack the spandex aqua bra!!"); addItem(1338, 3) startAnimation(326); addSkillXP((1200*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((300*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((635*playerLevel[19]), 19); actionTimer = 12; } break;

The error is
client.java:2425: ‘;’ expexted
startAnimation(326);
^[br][size=1]Posted on: September 01, 2007, 04:27:38 PM[/size][hr]please help

item.title: Help I cant remember how to do This Error,
item.dc:creator: @claber_guy claber guy
item.description:
@claber_guy wrote:

	sendMessage("YOU GET STRENGHT EXP!!!");
	addItem(4152, 2);
            actionTimer = 20;
	startAnimation(0x326);
	addSkillXP((630*playerLevel[2]), 2);
            addSkillXP((630*playerLevel[3]), 3);
            addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[13]), 13);
            updateRequired = true;
            appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

}
break;
